entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-04-26
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • IDE0047: Removing parentheses around a int array that is in a list, creates code that can not be compiled #78331

Closed

  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build feature.ssms_copilot-36025.25 #78332
  • Override completion doesn't offer to override assignment operators #78284
  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build main-10525.75 #78330

PullRequests

Created

  • Move remaining legacy workspace event listeners over to new APIs. #78333
    VSCode

Merged

  • Start moving workspace events to fire on background threads #78134
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Update ApplyUpdates API to account for no-effect changes #78220
    Area-Interactive, untriaged, VSCode, Next

Updated

  • Reduce duplicated FileUtilities.GetFileTimeStamp calls #78321
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Do not use nint / nuint in IL baselines #78246
    Area-Compilers
  • Extension methods #78328
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, VSCode
  • Fix async hoisted type substituted local #78231
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Switch to using field+auto-prop #76906
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Extract base LanguageServerProjectLoader from LanguageServerProjectSystem #78329
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, VSCode
  • Add BuildHost APIs for loading an in-memory project #78303
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
